title: CNPC signs 3-year diesel supply contract with Australia's Arrow Energy
text:
CNPC signs 3-year diesel supply contract with Australia's Arrow Energy

Commodities 16 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 12:00)

CNPC signs 3-year diesel supply contract with Australia's Arrow Energy BEIJING, Sept 16 (Reuters) - * China National Petroleum Corp (CNPC) will supply diesel to its Australian joint venture, Arrow Energy AOE.UL , for three years, the company said in a statement on Monday * The supply contract will help CNPC to expand refined oil product sales in Australia, it said * Arrow Energy, a coal seam gas producer, was jointly acquired by CNPC and Royal Dutch Shell in 2010 * CNPC did not provide details of the volume and value of the supply contract

CNPC signs 3-year diesel supply contract with Australia's Arrow Energy
description: CNPC signs 3-year diesel supply contract with Australia's Arrow Energy
